response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I understand its intrinsic worth to you stands at $1,200,000. My offer to you is to acquire this product for $1,150,000. This price reflects a strategic balance between ensuring a fair return on investment for us and providing you with an attractive opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to discussing the details further and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 1150000}
